text:
Denver, CO

Certainly wasn't planning on posting anything here, but the timing is right.

Looking for a seasoned React developer (one who also knows React Native) and is comfortable with a small company (just 3 of us currently).

We have a solid base of users (over half-a-million), a great growth rate (>50% annually), and we're looking for a great React developer that will be able to help move us forward.

If that sounds like you, please send your resume to jobs@race-monitor.com
